cause.description:
2 make as much money as possible, smoke tons of weed chil out in the sun and laugh about it.
1. no virgin lungs
2. ceremonial bongs
3. smoking canabis should be legal in the streets and bars
4. only high positioned dealers are allowed 2 sell canabis on the street
5. dealers and drug lords are only allowed 2 sell merchandise on designated turf
cause.name: Legalisation of Ganja
